title: KUNPCKBW/KUNPCKWD/KUNPCKDQ â€” Unpack for Mask Registers

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`KUNPCKBW k1, k2, k3`
`KUNPCKWD k1, k2, k3`
`KUNPCKDQ k1, k2, k3`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Unpacks the lower 8/16/32 bits of the second and third operands (source operands) into the low part of the first operand (destination operand), starting from the low bytes. The result is zero-extended in the destination.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
